snippet: What makes some petunias blue? Researchers have discovered a genetic glitch that produces the different shade, and weakens the plants.
abstract: Study in journal Cell Reports says reasearchers have discovered genetic mutation that produces blue petunias, a rarity in nature.
lead_paragraph: What makes some petunias blue? Researchers have discovered a genetic glitch that produces the different shade, and weakens the plants.

headline.print_headline: Plant Life: Mutant Petunias Sing the Blues
